p: Here, we performed a large-scale, comparative small interfering RNA (siRNA) screen with a human H1N1 IAV (WSN), a human H3N2 IAV (A/Panama/2007/1999(H3N2), PAN), an avian H5N1 IAV (A/Vietnam/1203/2004(H5N1), VN), and an IBV (B/Thuringia/02/2006xB/Vienna/33/2006, THW) to identify suitable targets for a host-directed influenza therapy.
